item.title: Experience the street food of Taiwan at Tea Valley
item.description:
Tea Valley: Bringing Taiwan’s Street Food Flavors to Singapore [Image of Tea Valley Downtown East outlet] Tea Valley (茶食坊), a casual Taiwanese dining chain in Singapore, has ambitious plans for expansion. At a tasting event held at their first location in Downtown East, Director Lawrence Lim shared his vision for growing the brand beyond just new locations, but also in the variety of services they offer. [Image of Lawrence Lim, Director of Tea Valley]..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/experience-the-street-food-of-taiwan-at-tea-valley/

item.title: Join us at Clarke Quay for the Once Upon a Nightmare free street party to celebrate Halloween
item.description:
Clarke Quay is hosting “Once Upon A Nightmare,” a street party they’re calling the most frightening Halloween event of the year. The event, which is free to attend, will be hosted by popular radio DJs Justin Ang and Vernon A from 98.7FM’s Muttons On The Move. Source: Clarke Quay. Attendees can enjoy live music from local band Enigma and participate in themed games for a chance to win prizes. Guests are encouraged to dress up in their most twisted and imaginative interpretations of fairytale characters...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/join-us-at-clarke-quay-for-the-once-upon-a-nightmare-free-street-party-to-celebrate-halloween/

item.title: Prepare yourself to taste delicious food from various regions at RWS Street Eats
item.description:
Resorts World Sentosa (RWS) is bringing back its popular food event, RWS Street Eats, after it attracted over 100,000 attendees last year. The event will run from May 3rd to 12th, 2019, and showcase new dishes from across Southeast Asia. Taking place at the Malaysian Food Street in RWS, this 10-day event will feature hidden culinary gems from Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand, Vietnam, and Taiwan. These vendors are local favorites, often known only to the savviest eaters in their respective countries...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/prepare-yourself-to-taste-delicious-food-from-various-regions-at-rws-street-eats/

item.title: The Bazaar Desa buffet at Novotel KL City Centre is a celebration of street food
item.description:
This Ramadan, enjoy the Bazaar Desa buffet at the Square restaurant in Novotel KL City Centre, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. The buffet is available from June 20th to July 15th and will feature three rotating menus. Pictured above: grilled squid, the noodle station, an assortment of regional fruits, drinks such as khatirah, peach tea, bandung coconut, sugarcane juice, and sweetcorn juice, and marinated chicken perchik on shawarma. Executive Chef Huzaidy and their team have designed the Bazaar Desa buffet to showcase the diverse street food culture found throughout Malaysia during Ramadan...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-bazaar-desa-buffet-at-novotel-kl-city-centre-is-a-celebration-of-street-food/
